languages.text: "В бою погибло несколько блюстителей, оказавшихся на месте событий, но больших жертв удалось избежать. Ваш... ксенос управился с агрессорами. Я бы не сообщала вам об этом, если бы мы установили способ, которым твари проникли на корабль. Пока нам не будет это известно доподлинно, мы не сумеем остановить будущие проникновения на борт".

traits.locale_text: "В бою погибло несколько блюстителей, оказавшихся на месте событий, но больших жертв удалось избежать. Ваш... ксенос управился с агрессорами. Я бы не сообщала вам об этом, если бы мы установили способ, которым твари проникли на корабль. Пока нам не будет это известно доподлинно, мы не сумеем остановить будущие проникновения на борт".

languages.text: "Several enforcers perished in the battle, but we managed to avoid significant casualties. Your... xenos took out the aggressors. I would not be bothering you with this if we had determined how the creatures got onto the ship. Until we know for sure, we won't be able to stop future incursions."
languages.original_text: "В бою погибло несколько блюстителей, оказавшихся на месте событий, но больших жертв удалось избежать. Ваш... ксенос управился с агрессорами. Я бы не сообщала вам об этом, если бы мы установили способ, которым твари проникли на корабль. Пока нам не будет это известно доподлинно, мы не сумеем остановить будущие проникновения на борт".

traits.locale_text: "The enforces on the scene perished battle, but we managed to avoid significant casualties. Your, uh. xenos took out the aggressors. I would not be bothering you with this if we had determined how the creatures got into the ship. Until we know this for sure, we cannot stop future incursions."

"The enforces on the scene perished battle, but we managed to avoid significant casualties. Your, uh. xenos took out the aggressors. I would not be bothering you with this if we had determined how the creatures got into the ship. Until we know this for sure, we cannot stop future incursions."

"Several enforcers perished in the battle, but we managed to avoid significant casualties. Your... xenos took out the aggressors. I would not be bothering you with this if we had determined how the creatures got onto the ship. Until we know for sure, we won't be able to stop future incursions."

"Several enforcers perished in the battle, but we managed to avoid significant casualties. Your... xenos took out the aggressors. I would not be bothering you with this if we had determined how the creatures got onto the ship. Until we know for sure, we won't be able to stop future incursions."

"Several enforcers perished in the battle, but we managed to avoid significant casualties. Your... xenos took out the aggressors. I would not be bothering you with this if we had determined how the creatures got onto the ship. Until we know for sure, we won't be able to stop future incursions."

languages.text: "Mehrere Enforcers sind bei der Schlacht gestorben, doch wir konnten schwere Verluste vermeiden. Euer ... Xenos hat die Aggressoren ausgeschaltet. Ich würde Euch nicht damit behelligen, wenn wir festgestellt hätten, wie die Kreaturen auf das Schiff gekommen sind. Bis wir es sicher wissen, können wir zukünftige Vorstöße nicht aufhalten."
languages.original_text: "Several enforcers perished in the battle, but we managed to avoid significant casualties. Your... xenos took out the aggressors. I would not be bothering you with this if we had determined how the creatures got onto the ship. Until we know for sure, we won't be able to stop future incursions."

traits.locale_text: "Mehrere Enforcers sind bei der Schlacht gestorben, doch wir konnten schwere Verluste vermeiden. Euer ... Xenos hat die Aggressoren ausgeschaltet. Ich würde Euch nicht damit behelligen, wenn wir festgestellt hätten, wie die Kreaturen auf das Schiff gekommen sind. Bis wir es sicher wissen, können wir zukünftige Vorstöße nicht aufhalten.

languages.text: “几名执法者在战斗中丧生，但我们设法避免了重大伤亡。您的……异形宠物消灭了那群侵略者。如果我们知道那些家伙是怎么混上船的，我就不会打扰您嘞。但目前我们并没有确定来源，也无法阻止未来可能的入侵。”
languages.original_text: "Several enforcers perished in the battle, but we managed to avoid significant casualties. Your... xenos took out the aggressors. I would not be bothering you with this if we had determined how the creatures got onto the ship. Until we know for sure, we won't be able to stop future incursions."

traits.locale_text: “几名执法者在战斗中丧生，但我们设法避免了重大伤亡。您的……异形宠物消灭了那群侵略者。如果我们知道那些家伙是怎么混上船的，我就不会打扰您嘞。但目前我们并没有确定来源，也无法阻止未来可能的入侵。”

languages.text: « Plusieurs prévôts ont péri lors de la bataille, mais nous avons réussi à éviter le pire. Votre... xénos a éliminé les agresseurs. Je vous dérange avec cela uniquement parce que nous ignorons encore comment les créatures se sont introduites à bord. Jusqu'à ce que nous le découvrions, nous ne pourrons pas éviter de nouvelles incursions. »
languages.original_text: "Several enforcers perished in the battle, but we managed to avoid significant casualties. Your... xenos took out the aggressors. I would not be bothering you with this if we had determined how the creatures got onto the ship. Until we know for sure, we won't be able to stop future incursions."

traits.locale_text: « Plusieurs prévôts ont péri lors de la bataille, mais nous avons réussi à éviter le pire. Votre... xénos a éliminé les agresseurs. Je vous dérange avec cela uniquement parce que nous ignorons encore comment les créatures se sont introduites à bord. Jusqu'à ce que nous le découvrions, nous ne pourrons pas éviter de nouvelles incursions. »

languages.text: «Varios miembros del personal de seguridad murieron durante la batalla, pero las bajas fueron escasas. Su.. xenos eliminó a los atacantes. No le molestaría con este asunto si hubiéramos determinado cómo han llegado las criaturas a la nave, pero hasta que lo sepamos no podremos detener otras incursiones».
languages.original_text: "Several enforcers perished in the battle, but we managed to avoid significant casualties. Your... xenos took out the aggressors. I would not be bothering you with this if we had determined how the creatures got onto the ship. Until we know for sure, we won't be able to stop future incursions."

traits.locale_text: «Varios miembros del personal de seguridad murieron durante la batalla, pero las bajas fueron escasas. Su.. xenos eliminó a los atacantes. No le molestaría con este asunto si hubiéramos determinado cómo han llegado las criaturas a la nave, pero hasta que lo sepamos no podremos detener otras incursiones».

languages.text: 「何人かのエンフォーサーは戦いの中で死にましたが、多大な死傷者を出すことは避けられました。陛下の…異種族がアグレッサーを倒しました。それがどうやってこ船に乗ってきたのが明らかになれば、これ以上詮索はしません。確実に知ることができるまで、今後の侵攻を止めることはできません」
languages.original_text: "Several enforcers perished in the battle, but we managed to avoid significant casualties. Your... xenos took out the aggressors. I would not be bothering you with this if we had determined how the creatures got onto the ship. Until we know for sure, we won't be able to stop future incursions."

traits.locale_text: 「何人かのエンフォーサーは戦いの中で死にましたが、多大な死傷者を出すことは避けられました。陛下の…異種族がアグレッサーを倒しました。それがどうやってこ船に乗ってきたのが明らかになれば、これ以上詮索はしません。確実に知ることができるまで、今後の侵攻を止めることはできません」

languages.text: "Çarpışmada kimi infazcılarımızı kaybetsek de ciddi zayiat vermekten kaçınmayı başardık. Saldırganları sizin... Zenonuz etkisiz hâle getirdi. Yaratıkların gemiye nasıl girdiğini belirleyebilseydik sizi bu hususla rahatsız etmezdim. Belirleyene dek gelecekteki baskınları durdurmamız mümkün olmayacak."
languages.original_text: "Several enforcers perished in the battle, but we managed to avoid significant casualties. Your... xenos took out the aggressors. I would not be bothering you with this if we had determined how the creatures got onto the ship. Until we know for sure, we won't be able to stop future incursions."

traits.locale_text: "Çarpışmada bazı infazcılarımızı kaybettik ancak ciddi zayiat vermekten kaçınmayı başardık. Saldırganları sizin... Zenonuz etkisiz hâle getirdi. Yaratıkların gemiye nasıl girdiğini belirleyebilseydik sizi bununla rahatsız etmezdim. Nasıl olduğunu anlayana kadar gelecekteki baskınları durdurmamız mümkün olmayacak."
